recipes.title: French toast
recipes.description: Very delicious and easy to make french toast with cinnamon and orange jam

steps.2: Place in a bowl eggs, cream, salt, sugar and ground cinnamon and mix well.

steps.3: Heat pan with butter on medium heat.

steps.4: Dip bread in egg mixture, turning to coat both sides evenly.

steps.5: Cook bread slices until browned on both sides.

steps.6: Spread one side of bread orange jam and sprinkle with icing sugar.

recipes.title: Bread
recipes.description: Very delicious and easy to make sourdough bread with olives and rosemary

steps.3: Leave for proof for 5-6 hours or until tripled

steps.1: Mix 9/10 of water and flour for 3-4 mins and leave for 60 minutes

steps.2: Add remaining water, salt and sourdough and knead the dough 5-6 mins, leave for 15 mins

steps.3: Fold douh and leave for 30 mins chill. Repeat this step two times more.

steps.4: Leave douh for fermentation for at least 3-3,5 hrs or doubled

steps.5: Divide dough, preshape and leave for 20 mins

steps.6: Shape dough, place on bowl and place in the fridge for 12-14 hrs.

steps.7: Preheat oven for 30 minutes at 450 degrees Farenheit

steps.8: Place baking sheet with water on the bottom in the oven

steps.9: Bake bread first 15 minutes with steam, remove tray with water and bake additional 15-20 minutes

recipes.title: Chicken pate
recipes.description: This silky smooth pate is super-satisfying to make.

steps.1: To make clarified butter, place unsalted butter in a pan on a very low heat and let it slowly melt 10 minutes. Use table spoon for remove the whey from the top of oil.

steps.2: Pell and finely chop onions and place in the two pans on a medium heat with olive oil. Strip the thyme leaves and fry for 5 minutes, until soft. In one pan add the mushrooms, salt and pepper and fry 5-6 minutes. In the second pan add chicken livers and a pinch of salt and black pepper. Cook for 4 minutes on a big heat, add the brandy to the pan and cook for 2 minutes more.

steps.3: Tip everything straight into a food processor and blend until smooth. Dice salted butter and add to the processor, then add truffle oil and blend until silky smooth and the mixture start to shine. Taste and season to perfection. Serve the pate in a bowl.

steps.4: Put the pan with clarified butter on a medium heat and add sage leaves. When the leaves becomes crispy, pop the sage leaves on top of the pate, then pour over the clarified butter. Put into the fridge for a 4-5 hours until set.

steps.5: Serve this with toast, cornichons and a glass of wine.

recipes.title: Strawberry rollcake
recipes.description: Very delicious and easy to make strawberry rollcake with vanilla ganache

steps.1: Milk and butter bring to a boil.

steps.3: Egg whites beat to soft peaks.

steps.4: Flour mix transfer to mixer bowl with paddle attachment and beat for decrease temperature. Add mix eggs and yolks portioned. Mix to smooth texture.

steps.5: Combine together flour mix and beaten egg whites.

steps.6: Spread on baking mat and bake at 360F for 10-12 minutes.

steps.1: Add the cream and vanilla to a pan and bring it to a gentle simmer.

steps.2: Meanwhile add the white chocolate, mascarpone and melted gelatin to a jug.

steps.3: Pour over the hot cream and blend. Pour it into a bowl and cover and chill overnight. Do not skip this.

steps.4: Whisk to soft peaks and then pipe. Keep an eye on it so you don’t over whip it.

parts.title: Akrapovic GP Slip-On Exhaust Yamaha R6 2017-2020
parts.description: The Akrapovic GP-styled Slip-On is a high-performance exhaust that takes design cues from the exhaust found on the factory Yamaha M1 MotoGP bike. Made from titanium, a race-proven material, this exhaust system results in a boost in performance and noticeable weight reduction. Slip-Ons represent the first step in the exhaust system tuning process, and they offer a great balance between price and performance. Change the nature of your bike by adding more power, improved performance, and the unique Akrapovic sound. It’s not just about peak power, Akrapovic exhaust systems deliver increased performance throughout the entire rpm range. Increased power and torque result in a much smoother ride. All Akrapovič exhaust system measurements are made on Akrapovic's computer-controlled flowbenches

parts.title: Silver’s NEOMAX Coilover Kit - Toyota Supra A90 RWD 2019+

features.f1: Adjustable T6 6061 front camber plates on all McPherson style applications.

features.f2: Koyo Japan Radial Bearing upper spring perch standard on all applicable McPherson applications. This eliminates spring bind, noise, and gives improved driver feedback.

features.f3: 24 levels of dampening adjustability combined with our high grade shock oil, not only do you feel the click in your fingers, you feel every dampening adjustment in the driver's seat.

features.f4: High strength JIS G3445-STKM13C (DIN2393-ST44-2) carbon steel 52mm diameter seamless shock tube.

features.f5: 44mm piston with digressive style valving characteristics provides maximum low speed damping response for ultimate performance while simultaneously giving a comfortable ride.

features.f6: Mono-tube shock design, Increases shock oil capacity as well as displacement over twin tube designs for maximum performance.

features.f7: High viscosity IP F.A. 5W damper oil ensures the best efficiency and consistency of shock-absorption and dampening control.

features.f8: Height adjustability is provided by the lower bracket which prevents the need to adjust the spring perch or preload, offering the maximum possible travel regardless of height setting.

features.f9: Cold-bent springs made from high strength SAE9254 steel which keeps stable elastic modulus.

features.f10: Powder coated steel lower brackets matching all factory brake line & ABS wire tabs, for seamless installation.

features.f11: Anodized T6 6061 aluminum lower mounts for multi-link suspension systems to lower unsprung weight.

shampoo.title: Avon Man Hair & Body Wash
shampoo.subtitle: Шампунь-гель для душа для мужчин
shampoo.description: Гель освежает кожу, не пересушивая ее, и придает мягкость. Также подходит для ухода за волосами. Обладает древесно-восточно-фруктовым ароматом с нотами свежей мяты, яблока и мха.
shampoo.ingredients: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, GLYCERIN, COCAMIDE MEA, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, POLYSORBATE 20, PARFUM, SODIUM CHLORIDE, DISODIUM EDTA, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRASTEARATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, PHOSPHORIC ACID, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, LIMONENE.

shampoo.title: Avon Naturals
shampoo.subtitle: Шампунь / Ополаскиватель 2 в 1 с витаминным комплексом
shampoo.description: Сила витаминов для красоты твоих волос! Формула с витаминным комплексом (Е, В3 и В5) дарит энергию тусклым, поврежденным волосам, возвращая им красоту и здоровье.
shampoo.ingredients: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, GLYCERIN, COCAMIDE MEA, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, POLYSORBATE 20, PARFUM, SODIUM CHLORIDE, DISODIUM EDTA, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRASTEARATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, PHOSPHORIC ACID, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, LIMONENE.

shampoo.title: Avon 'ВОССТАНОВЛЕНИЕ'
shampoo.subtitle: Шампунь для волос с маслом кокоса
shampoo.description: Максимальное увлажнение и восстановление волос с кокосовым маслом. Деликатная формула подойдет всем твоим близким: и большим, и маленьким. Предназначен для всех типов кожи.
shampoo.ingredients: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, GLYCERIN, COCAMIDE MEA, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, POLYSORBATE 20, PARFUM, SODIUM CHLORIDE, DISODIUM EDTA, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRASTEARATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, PHOSPHORIC ACID, METHYLCHLOROISOTHIAZOLINONE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, LIMONENE.
